abstract.text: Adjust the characteristics of views in a hierarchy.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: SwiftUI enables you to tune the appearance and behavior of views using view
Many modifiers apply to specific kinds of views or behaviors, but
some apply more generally. For example, you can conditionally hide any view
by dynamically setting its opacity, display contextual help when people hover
over a view, or request the light or dark appearance for a view.

SwiftUI-PageImage-card.png.alt: A black Swift logo on a swirly blue and purple background.

View-Fundamentals-PageImage-card.png.alt: A conceptual illustration showing a view decomposed into different components.
